Package spring.service

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommentService
    Service for handling all requests related to Comments.
    DevelopmentService
    Service for handling all requests related to Developments.
    IdeaService
    Service for handling all requests related to Ideas.
    ServiceFacade
    Facade for managing the IdeaService, UserService, VoteService, DevelopmentService, and CommentService.
    UserDetailsService
    Service required for handling user login/logout functionality.
    UserService
    Service for handling all requests related to Users.
    VoteService
    Service for creating IdeaVotes, DevelopmentVotes, and CommentVotes.
